DF_CHAT_ENHANCE.ReloadGameContent: Changes will only go into effect on reload. Would you like to reload now?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.Settings_HideExport: Chat Archive: Hide the Export Chat Log button
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_Delete: Delete the chat messages from the chat log?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_ErrorNameMiss: Must provide a name for the new archive!
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_ErrorDatesMis: Must provide both 'From' and 'To' dates if archiving by date range!
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_NoticeSuccess: The new archive "{0}" has been created
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_NotItems: You do not have any chat archives
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_ErrorBadI: The id for the selected chat archive does not exist.

DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_DeleteCont: Are you sure you wish to apply all previous deletion?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Merge: Merge an archive into this one
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Merge_Sele: Select a chat archive to merge into
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Merge_Only: There are no other archives available for merging
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Error_Dele: Cannot delete all of the chats in an Archive. If you wish to delete an archive, please do so from the Archive Manager.
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_EnableTitle: Roll Buttons: Replace roll type selector with buttons
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_EnableHint: (Requires Reload) Replace the drop-down menu selector for roll types with a set of four buttons.
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_ReplaceButtonsT: Roll Buttons: Use button style on all chat buttons
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_ReplaceButtonsH: (Requires Reload) Restyle the other chat buttons to look the same as the new Roll Type buttons.
DF_CHAT_LOG.CommandDescription: Submit an event to the Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.GMCommandDescription: Submit an event to the GM Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_EnableHint: Enables the Adventure Log feature for logging events to a journal directly from the chat sidebar
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_GmOnlyTitle: Adventure Log: Set Adventure Log GM Only
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_GmOnlyHint: Sets the Adventure Log commands to be GM only
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_GmOnlyWhisperName: Adventure Log: (If GM Only) All Logs are Whispsers
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_GmOnlyWhisperHint: If the above GM Only setting is on, this will make all log entry chat messages be whispers
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_PrintMessagesName: Adventure Log: Post logs to chat
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_PrintMessagesHint: Post a message to the chat for new Adventure Log entries
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_SortDescendingName: Adventure Log: Sort Newest on Top
DF_CHAT_LOG.Setting_SortDescendingHint: Sort the adventure log with the newest messages at the top of the log, and oldest message at the bottom of the log.
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_LibWrapperMissing: You do not have libWrapper enabled. Adventure Log depends on this module and will not operate without it.
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_ConfigGmOnly: Only the GM is allowed to change the Adventure Log configuration.
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_Disabled: The Gamemaster has disabled the Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_NoJournalSet: The Gamemaster has not set a journal for use as an Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_NoJournalSetGM: There is no journal set for use as an Adventure Log. Use "/log config" to set one
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_MissingQuote: You are missing the closing quote for {0}
DF_CHAT_LOG.Error_MissingMessage: You did not supply a message
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_JournalSelect: Journal to use as the Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_GMJournalSelect: Journal to use as the GM Only Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_ClearContent: Clear all contents of the journal
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_GmClearContent: Clear all contents of the GM Only journal
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_JournalPermissions: Anyone who will log events will need permission to edit the selected Journal.
DF_CHAT_LOG.ContextMenu_AsGmEvent: GM Adventure Log as an Event
DF_CHAT_LOG.ContextMenu_AsGmQuote: GM Adventure Log as a Quote
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_AllowEditHint: Allow players to edit the messages they send
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_GMEditAllName: Chat Edit: GM can edit all
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_GMEditAllHint: Allow GMs to edit anyone's message instead of just their own
